original_title: お金を貸した同級生の新婚妻を3日間、僕専用メイドで雇って中出し返済させた。
overview: Mina learns that her husband borrowed money from a rich classmate and he is in a tight spot. They decide to go meet him together and solve the situation.  But as it happens, the guy counters with an outrageous proposal: He wants Mina to be his maid for 3 days, and the debt will be canceled…
title: I Had A Classmate’s New Wife Be My Personal Maid For 3 Days To Pay Back Owed Money With Creampie Loads. Mina Kitano
